law.catch_line: A property deeded before January 1, 1994, and improved with a residence before January 1, 2007, is e...
law.text: A property deeded before January 1, 1994, and improved with a residence before January 1, 2007, is exempt from the subdivision regulations adopted by the county under Title 5 of this article for purposes of constructing additions to the residence or accessory buildings.
